plot: Sting's wife Trudie Styler documents the turbulent bureaucracy both Sting and the filmmakers went through in order to complete "The Emperor's New Groove", a Disney film that underwent extensive storyline changes from start to finish.
title: The Sweatbox
plot_es: Sting's wife Trudie Styler documents the turbulent bureaucracy both Sting and the filmmakers went through in order to complete "The Emperor's New Groove", a Disney film that underwent extensive storyline changes from start to finish.
plot_en: Sting's wife Trudie Styler documents the turbulent bureaucracy both Sting and the filmmakers went through in order to complete "The Emperor's New Groove", a Disney film that underwent extensive storyline changes from start to finish.
